name: neovim
description: Neovim: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: lua
dependencies.description: The Lua programming language interpreter and library.

dependencies.name: libuv
dependencies.description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependencies.name: jemalloc
dependencies.description:
jemalloc is a general purpose malloc(3) implementation that emphasizes
fragmentation avoidance and scalable concurrency support.

dependencies.name: libtermkey
dependencies.description: Easy keyboard entry processing for terminal programs

dependencies.name: libvterm
dependencies.description: An abstract library implementation of a terminal emulator

dependencies.name: msgpack-c
dependencies.description: A small, fast binary interchange format convertible to/from JSON

dependencies.name: gperf
dependencies.description:
GNU gperf is a perfect hash function generator. For a given list of
strings, it produces a hash function and hash table, in form of C or C++
code, for looking up a value depending on the input string. The hash
function is perfect, which means that the hash table has no collisions,
and the hash table lookup needs a single string comparison only.

dependencies.name: libluv
dependencies.description:
This library makes libuv available to lua scripts. It was made for the
luvit project but should usable from nearly any lua project.

dependencies.name: tree-sitter
dependencies.description:
Tree-sitter is a parser generator tool and an incremental parsing
library. It can build a concrete syntax tree for a source file and
efficiently update the syntax tree as the source file is edited.
